channel.title: Paper on David A W Barton
channel.description: Recent content in Paper on David A W Barton

item.title: Unlocking the potential of PDE-constrained optimal control: a dive into numerical methods
item.description:
An overview of ‘A Comparison of Mesh-Free Differentiable Programming and Data-Driven Strategies for Optimal Control under PDE Constraints’, Roussel D. Nzoyem Ngueguin, David A.W. Barton, Tom Deakin, SC23, Denver, USA

Available on arXiv or via the ACM

A BibTeX reference is also available.

Editorial note: I’ve often intended to create blog posts of papers that I’ve been involved with but I’ve never managed to make time to do it. However, in the world of ChatGPT we can automatically (and largely accurately) generate them.
